titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Caröe went off to town by the 8.20 a.m. express. I wrote a little sermon for the troops, & then had interviews with my colleagues on the difficult question of the Cathedral architect. M
Watts from Witton Gilbert called to beg me to consider his son for a chapter living: he stayed to lunch.
